Centennial.Fiddler's Green Amphitheatre:
Fiddler's Green Amphitheatre (formerly Coors Amphitheatre and Comfort Dental Amphitheatre) is an 18,000-capacity amphitheatre located in Greenwood Village, Colorado. It is the largest outdoor amphitheatre in the Denver metropolitan area and is generally open every year from May to September.


== About ==
It features 7,500 fixed seats and a general admission lawn section.
